rules_text:
Chosen one [i]({W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Transform this permanent.)[/i]
When Tomb Steward enters, search your library for a card and put it into your graveyard. Then shuffle.
rules_text2:
Flying, lifelink
Pay 5 life: Put target permanent card in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text2: [i]“Careful, or you might find yourself in [/i]grave [i]danger. Heh.”[/i]
